<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function handles the high level operations of GNU objcopy including</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// handling command line options. It&#39;s important to outline certain properties</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we expect to hold of the command line operations. Any operation that &quot;keeps&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// should keep regardless of a remove. Additionally any removal should respect</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// any previous removals. Lastly whether or not something is removed shouldn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// depend a) on the order the options occur in or b) on some opaque priority</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// system. The only priority is that keeps/copies overrule removes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784" lineLink="#a1a0331e763d1ccb3e64db8de4d9791c8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="#a1a0331e763d1ccb3e64db8de4d9791c8">handleArgs</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig">CommonConfig</a> &amp;Config, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/elfconfig">ELFConfig</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
